articles.description: Fallout 76 fans are reporting an odd bug with the introduction of Wastelanders. During open world events, NPCs are taking weapons off the bodies of players — and they’re not returning them.
articles.content:
Fallout 76s new Wastelanders expansion is a solid update that brings a traditional Fallout-style RPG structure, NPCs and all, to the once-barren hills of Appalachia. But some of the bugs players are discovering are as unfortunate as they are hilarious. 
Spot… [+1639 chars]

articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake: Chapter 14 Side-Quests Guide - GameSpot
articles.description: Here's a breakdown on how to find and complete every side-quest in FF7 Chapter 14.
articles.content: One of the biggest surprises to uncover in Final Fantasy 7 Remake is the breadth of optional missions and characters around Midgar. While the battle between the rebels of Avalanche and the evil Shinra Electric Company is at the forefront, it's worth taking so… [+14647 chars]

articles.title: iPhone SE: How to preorder and buy Apple's $399 iPhone right now - CNET
articles.description: Preorders are now open for the $399 second-generation iPhone SE with Apple and major retailers. Here are all the details you need to know, including deals from carriers and retailers alike.
articles.content:
Apple's new iPhone SE is the cheapest -- and we think the best value -- iPhone you can buy. 
Gabriel Sama/CNET

articles.content:
